product_name: Timex Expedition Shock XL Vibrating Watch - Men's
long_description: The Timex Expedition Shock XL vibrating watch is both rugged and timeless offering a large display, vibrating alarm, durable case and comfortable strap. 100-hour chronograph features lap or split option; lap counter tracks up to 99 laps; 24-hr. countdown timer has countdown/stop and countdown/repeat modes. Three vibrating alarms can be set for day, weekday, weekend and week with five-min. snooze. Two time zone settings make traveling easy; 12- or 24-hour time format suits your personal preference. INDIGLO(R) night light illuminates the display for easy use at night. Lightweight, strong resin case and strap stand up to heavy use during your outdoor adventures. The Timex Expedition Shock XL vibrating watch is water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Expedition Shock XL vibrating watch is both rugged and timeless offering a large display, vibrating alarm, durable case and comfortable strap.
